entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Ice fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Ice fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
